history.proof: intros. apply prod2list_le_l; auto. - shelve. - shelve.

chat.content:
A: Type
f: A -> nat
============================
forall (a b : nat) (c d : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 : list nat) (l4 l5 l6 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l4 -> length l2 = length l5 -> length l3 = length l6 -> sum_leaves f d <= sum_leaves f c -> b <= a -> prod2list (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3) (l4 ++ d :: l5 ++ c :: l6) <= prod2list (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3) (l4 ++ c :: l5 ++ d :: l6)

Related definitions and lemmas:
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
prod2list = fun (l1 : list nat) (l2 : list (btree A)) => fold_left Init.Nat.add (map2 (fun (a : nat) (b : btree A) => a * sum_leaves f b + weight_tree f b) l1 l2) 0 : list nat -> list (btree A) -> nat Arguments prod2list (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
sum_leaves : forall A : Type, (A -> nat) -> btree A -> nat
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
prod2list_le_l : forall (a b : nat) (c d : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 : list nat) (l4 l5 l6 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l4 -> length l2 = length l5 -> length l3 = length l6 -> sum_leaves f c <= sum_leaves f d -> a <= b -> prod2list (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3) (l4 ++ d :: l5 ++ c :: l6) <= prod2list (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3) (l4 ++ c :: l5 ++ d :: l6)
same_length_ex : forall (A B : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A) (l3 : list B), length (l1 ++ a :: l2) = length l3 -> exists (l4 l5 : list B) (b : B), length l1 = length l4 /\ length l2 = length l5 /\ l3 = l4 ++ b :: l5
app_inv_app2 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A) (a b : A), l1 ++ l2 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l4 -> (exists l5 : list A, l1 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l5) \/ (exists l5 : list A, l2 = l5 ++ a :: b :: l4) \/ l1 = l3 ++ a :: nil /\ l2 = b :: l4
prod2list_app : forall (l1 : list nat) (l2 : list (btree A)) (l3 : list nat) (l4 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l2 -> prod2list (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) = prod2list l1 l2 + prod2list l3 l4
app_inv_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A) (a : A), l1 ++ l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 -> (exists l5 : list A, l1 = l3 ++ a :: l5) \/ (exists l5 : list A, l2 = l5 ++ a :: l4)
permutation_transposition : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l1 l2 l3 : list A), permutation (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3) (l1 ++ b :: l2 ++ a :: l3)
map2_app : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B -> C) (l1 : list A) (l2 : list B) (l3 : list A) (l4 : list B), length l1 = length l2 -> map2 f (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) = map2 f l1 l2 ++ map2 f l3 l4
permutation_cons_ex_aux : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> forall l11 l12 : list A, l1 = l11 ++ a :: l12 -> exists l3 l4 : list A, l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 /\ permutation (l11 ++ l12) (l3 ++ l4)
permutation_cons_ex : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation (a :: l1) l2 -> exists l3 l4 : list A, l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 /\ permutation l1 (l3 ++ l4)
nth_split : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), n < length l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ nth n l d :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
first_n_app1 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), length l1 <= n -> first_n (l1 ++ l2) n = l1 ++ first_n l2 (n - length l1)
skip_n_app2 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n <= length l1 -> skip_n (l1 ++ l2) n = skip_n l1 n ++ l2
permutation_app_comp : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l3 l4 -> permutation (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4)
skip_n_app1 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), length l1 <= n -> skip_n (l1 ++ l2) n = skip_n l2 (n - length l1)
nth_error_split : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (a : A), nth_error l n = Some a -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
first_n_app2 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n <= length l1 -> first_n (l1 ++ l2) n = first_n l1 n
Add_app : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), Add a (l1 ++ l2) (l1 ++ a :: l2)
ordered_perm_antisym_eq : forall (A : Type) (order : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c) -> (forall a b : A, order a b -> order b a -> a = b) -> forall l1 l2 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> ordered order l1 -> ordered order l2 -> l1 = l2
Inductive permutation (A : Type) : list A -> list A -> Prop := permutation_nil : permutation nil nil | permutation_skip : forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1) | permutation_swap : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), permutation (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l) | permutation_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3 Arguments permutation [A]%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_nil _%type_scope Arguments permutation_skip _%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_swap _%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments permutation_trans _%type_scope (_ _ _)%list_scope
length_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), length (l1 ++ l2) = length l1 + length l2
weight_tree_list_node : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), weight_tree_list f (node t1 t2 :: l) = sum_leaves f t1 + sum_leaves f t2 + weight_tree_list f (t1 :: t2 :: l)
exist_first_max : forall l : list nat, l <> nil -> exists (a : nat) (l1 l2 : list nat), l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l1 -> n1 < a) /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l2 -> n1 <= a)
Add_split : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ l2 /\ l' = l1 ++ a :: l2
fold_left_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list B), fold_left f (l1 ++ l2) a = fold_left f l2 (fold_left f l1 a)
in_ex_app : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), In a l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2
app_nth2 : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (d : A) (n : nat), n >= length l -> nth n (l ++ l') d = nth (n - length l) l' d
nth_overflow : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (d : A), length l <= n -> nth n l d = d
app_nth1 : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (d : A) (n : nat), n < length l -> nth n (l ++ l') d = nth n l d
weight_tree_list_permutation : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), permutation l1 l2 -> weight_tree_list f l1 = weight_tree_list f l2
